details.description: Manages building operations and coordinates with various departments.

daily_schedule.llm_reasoning: As a building manager, Jane starts her day early in the office to review overnight reports and plan daily operations.
Jane uses the cafe as an informal meeting space to connect with staff and visitors, building relationships while staying accessible.
Lunch break in the cafe allows Jane to continue informal networking and observe facility usage patterns.
Afternoon meetings in conference room for strategic planning and departmental coordination - formal business requires dedicated space.
End-of-day wrap-up in office to complete administrative tasks and prepare for next day before building closes.

details.description: Conducts research in machine learning and LLM behavior analysis.

daily_schedule.llm_reasoning: Edgar prefers quiet morning hours in library for deep reading and literature review when his concentration is highest.
Mid-morning lab time for experimental work when Edgar is mentally sharp but energy levels allow for hands-on technical tasks.
Social lunch break in cafe provides Edgar with necessary social interaction to balance his solitary research work.
Afternoon return to library for writing and analysis - post-lunch period suits Edgar's preference for reflective, analytical work.
Evening lab session for running long experiments that can continue overnight - Edgar optimizes his schedule around computational resources.
